Transaction_State_Context.Deposit_State: When users send ETH, Deposit is called, and balances are updated.
Transaction_State_Context.Collect_State: When users withdraw ETH using the Collect function, checks and external calls are performed.

External_Interactions.Deposit_Interaction: Transfers ETH from the sender to the contract.
External_Interactions.Collect_Interaction: Transfers ETH from the contract to the sender using a call to the sender's address.
